story_stone_05_01000/2401_1101_0100_20:
A short time had passed since the children found
the mysterious stones.
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1101_0200_20:
Despite some imperfections, Professor Bellis
managed to extract energy from them...
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_0300_10:
At the very least, my experiments managed to
successfully confirm that the energy of these stones
is drawn out by the power of one’s heart.
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_0400_10:
However, unlike sync stones, these ones are not
so easily handled...
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_0500_10:
When the time comes to present my research, I’d
like a sync pair with a powerful bond to lend
me a hand in a demonstration.
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_0600_10:
Would you mind participating in the demo,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_0700_10: We’re the ones who endorsed you.
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_0800_10:
We felt there was no better example of a sync
pair with a powerful bond.
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_1000_10:
Oh, but wait...weren’t you all helping Professor
Bellis with her research?
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_1100_10: Aren’t you going to participate in the demo?
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_1300_10:
It’s true that we’re familiar with how to use the
mysterious stones because we helped with some
preliminary tests...
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_1400_10:
And the power of these stones could unlock new
possibilities for sync pairs on Pasio, right?
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_1500_10:
Precisely. That’s why we thought someone like
[Name:PlayerNickname ]—a leader of the next
generation—would be more fitting than one of us.
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_1600_10:
Especially because the presentation will be in front
of a lot of people!
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_1800_10:
I’m still curious about what sorts of new
possibilities you three could unlock, though.
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_2200_10:
Well then, if we want to turn more of these
possibilities into realities...
story_stone_05_01000/2401_1201_2300_10:
we’ll need to give [Name:PlayerNickname ] a
lecture on how to use the stones!
